title: Full Time DM Sales Representative - only DMs, NO CALLS required
job_overview:
Hey there!

We have opened another position.

I'm looking for a full-time virtual assistant to join my team and help with some exciting work. My company helps businesses with large Instagram audiences sell their products/services directly to their followers through text messages, and I need someone reliable who can be part of this journey long-term.

What's the job?

You’ll be starting and coordinating sales conversations with our clients' Instagram followers. Don’t worry - you won’t have to come up with what to say. We’ll provide you with the exact messages and the order in which to send them. You need to copy-paste the messages and send them as instructed and coordinate the conversation.

What we’re looking for:

Someone dependable and willing to work full-time. Excellent English skills, understands US lingo, and the ability to communicate clearly through text.

A friendly and professional approach when chatting with followers. Open to ongoing training and support, as we're always here to help you do your best.

- MALES ONLY

- You must have at least 2 years of sales experience.

- You must know how to use social media, specifically instagram

- You must be very communicative

- You must be reliable, this is not a 1 month project, this is long-term employment

- PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT MEET THE CRITERIA ABOVE

Why join us?

Simple tasks with clear instructions provided. Consistent training and support, so you'll always feel prepared. A long-term position where we can grow together. We have multiple PH employees who are working full time with us and they're amazing.

If you're interested and think this could be a good fit for you, I’d love to hear from you!

Let me know, and we can discuss more details.

Thank you.
